snippet: The bitter race for governor of Connecticut was too close to call, but Gov. Dannel P. Malloy appeared to open a lead against the Republican challenger, Thomas C. Foley.
abstract: Connecticut Gov Dannel P Malloy opens lead against Republican challenger Thomas C Foley, with results still coming in from state's heavily Democratic cities.

byline.contributor: Alison Leigh Cowan and Kristin Hussey contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The bitter race for governor of Connecticut was too close to call, but Gov. Dannel P. Malloy appeared to open a lead against the Republican challenger, Thomas C. Foley.

headline.main: With Same Candidates as in ’10, Race for Connecticut Governor Is Again Tight
headline.print_headline: With Same Candidates as in ’10, Race for Connecticut Governor Is Again Tight
